# vngcloud_vdb_backup_storage (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "vngcloud_vdb_backup_storage" "backup_storage" {
  backup_storage_package_id = 1
  backup_storage_package_name = "db.backup.quota.1"
  engine_group = 1
  quota = 10
}
```
